trait.name: Fallible Invisibility
entries: The skulk is {@condition invisible}. This invisibility can be circumvented by three things:

items.name: Charnel Candles
entries: The skulk appears as a dim, translucent form in the light of a candle made of fat rendered from a corpse whose identity is unknown.

items.name: Children
entries: Humanoid children, aged 10 and under, can see through this invisibility.

items.name: Reflective Surfaces
entries: The skulk appears as a drab, smooth-skinned biped if its reflection can be seen in a mirror or on another surface.

trait.name: Trackless
entries: The skulk leaves no tracks to indicate where it has been or where it's headed.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.
